abstract_ssm: Three items, dated 1988, showing interiors of historic houses in the Fort Greene neighborhood of Brooklyn. Images in the collection include a mid-century kitchen and a colonial dining room and parlor. Photographs in the collection were taken by Phoebe Ferguson during a tour of landmarked homes given by the Fort Greene Landmarks Preservation Committee. A press release for the tour is available in the accession folder.
subject_ssm: Historic preservation |z New York (State) |z Kings County
